attributes.action: create a sponsorship scheme for govt endorsement of teachers' web pages and cosnider a competition National Year of Reading 2008 initiative
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many professionals use the internet to access, advertise and share their resources - but a govt logo would reassure the public that these are designed according to the National Curriculum and key stages. Also - what about a prize - giving competition for this month's or this year's beat web page ? You could call it Gordon's brown book cabinet !
